summary: This mod fixes the bug where Lydia can\'t be married.
descriptionHtml:
The reason why you can\'t marry Lydia in vanilla Skyrim is because in the \"potentialmarriage\" faction, Lydia is set as -1 while everyone else is set as 0. Some thought it was because she\'s a housecarl but the other housecarls CAN be married. Why? Because they are set as 0. This mod just changes Lydia to 0.

How to install:
Extract the .zip folder using your favourite program, 7zip, winrar etc.
Drag and drop the .esp into Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
Start Steam, start Skyrim and then go into \"Data Files\" and tick the box next to the .esp.
PLAY!
author: Shotgun188
